intro: Poikilogyne robusta, commonly known as the robust poikilogyne, is a perennial herbaceous plant native to tropical regions. It features a robust stem with alternate, broad, lance-shaped leaves that are often hairy. The plant produces small, inconspicuous flowers in clusters, which are typically greenish-white in color. Its roots are fibrous and can be used in traditional medicine for their purported healing properties. Poikilogyne robusta thrives in moist, well-drained soils and is often found in shaded forest understories.
